nodes.text: The Hunter-Seeker droid dispenser was a type of droid dispenser used to deploy the Droideka-like Hunter-Seeker droids commonly used in the Invasion of Naboo and Separatist Crisis.
Hunter-Seeker droids were present at the Skirmish at Eos along with the Turret droid dispenser to defend a mining center on the planet.
The dispensers appear in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Starfighter.
